title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve
title_original: Imily Bela Womens Cable Knit Half Zip Sweater V Neck Collared Fall Trendy Oversized Long Sleeve Pullover Tops

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and warm for winter, with good weight and great quality. The look receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it maintains its appearance after multiple washes. The size and color receive mixed reviews - while some say it fits true to size, others find the sleeves too big, and while many like the color, some mention it's lighter than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll Love
items.body: One of the best cable knit 1/4 zipper sweaters I ever bought. Soft and warm for winter. I layer it with a turtleneck and love the look! I have 5 of these sweaters now and I highly recommend them. Fits true to size. If you want the sweater to not be baggy, then size down to your next size I am totally in love with these sweaters. They are beautiful and have received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Kristen Ashurst

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great warm sweater.
items.body: This sweater is so soft and warm! It’ll be perfect for the cold winters here in Minnesota. The reason I gave it four stars is that the sleeves are a bit funky. They are very wide, especially at the wrists. It’s also a bit on the long side. Haven’t washed it yet so I can’t speak to that. But overall I really like it. It’s high quality for the price. Read more
items.author: creative girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this! Just as pictured.
items.body: Material is soft and has some stretch making it super comfortable! Sleeves are straight, not tight. At 5’8” and 150lbs, I got a medium. But thinking I could have gone for a small for a little snigger fit. Looks great with leggings, covers about half my behind. If you’re shorter, this would cover fully. Zipper is not too low cut to have all the way down. Read more
items.author: KEE@NC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but zipper didn’t work
items.body: Pretty sweater but zipper was cheaply made and kept getting stuck Read more
items.author: Mollymo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great warm sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. I loved it so much I bought another one in white. Fits well the only thing is the sleeves are quite wide, but length is perfect Read more
items.author: Carol Griffith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this sweater
items.body: Loved the feel and the warmth. You can layer with it depending on how cold. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but didn’t work for me!
items.body: This cable knit sweater was really cute and I generally love the zip front collar tops but this one was not for me. I ordered my normal size small and the sweater fit true to size and was soft, mid weight and a good quality. It could have been worn nicely with leggings or partially tucked in with jeans so it would be quite versatile in your wardrobe. The sweater was a very nice sweater, but it was wasn’t the look I was after in a cable knit so I returned it. Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, soft and comfy
items.body: I am super picky about sweaters as I like to hide my belly and prefer them to be loose around the hips/waist and this is perfect for that. The sweater is very soft and about medium weight so not too hot and perfect for a chilly office. I wish the sleeves weren't quite so loose around the cuffs but I love everything else so much that I can deal with that. I'll be ordering more in different colors! Read more
items.author: Tristan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Khaki, White, Beige, Burgundy, Black, Coffee, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
